definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: The nightmare is really effective, some people die a violent death mystically, some people are murdered strangely.
sentences.chinese: 噩夢果真靈驗，有人神祕暴斃，有人離奇遇害。

sentences.english: He should kneel down in front of the whole family and keep confessing for the rest of his life.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的醫生，應當跪倒在遇害家人面前，懺悔終生。

sentences.english: But the previous day, as rain fell, he had visited the site where Rosenberg was shot.
sentences.chinese: 但前一天，他冒雨查看了羅森博格遇害的地點。

sentences.english: Mollen is the second U.S. diplomat to be killed in Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 莫倫是在伊拉克遇害的第二名美國外交官。

sentences.english: A couple that were both police officers were found slaughtered in their home in Hongdong county of Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 山西省洪洞縣一對警察夫婦近日在家中遇害。

sentences.english: Many people are killed living under that weather.
sentences.chinese: 生活在那種天氣下，很多人都不幸遇害了。

sentences.english: Dolan succeeds in having Elizabeth killed before she can testify against him.
sentences.chinese: 刀郎成功在伊麗莎白遇害前，她可以作證反對他。

sentences.english: It lighted up the room where the murdered woman lay.
sentences.chinese: 陽光照亮了橫放着那個遇害女子的房間。

sentences.english: Many of the victims were doing last-minute Christmas shopping.
sentences.chinese: 很多遇害者是進行最後聖誕節購物的人們。

sentences.english: The magnate was murdered at a gathering of relatives and friends.
sentences.chinese: 生前衆叛親離的富豪在親友聚會中遇害。

sentences.english: Both victims were slaughteredduring the summertime.
sentences.chinese: 受害者都是在夏季遇害的。

sentences.english: In July Jordan's father was murdered in North Carolina.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月，喬丹的父親在北卡羅萊納遇害。

sentences.english: Attack on Chinese boats on Mekong River kills 13.
sentences.chinese: 中國船員泰國湄公河遭劫，13人全部遇害。

sentences.english: Sanjive Piwandakar was a close friend of the slain officer.
sentences.chinese: 皮萬達卡爾是這位遇害警官的好友。

sentences.english: Most of the victims had been bound and blindfolded with adhesive tape and shot, the paper said.
sentences.chinese: 大部分遇害者在同一地點被發現，被矇眼後槍殺。

sentences.english: The police found a revolver at the scene, just beside the victim's right hand.
sentences.chinese: 警察在現場發現一把左輪手槍，就在遇害者右手旁邊。

definition: to die tragically/to meet with a violent death
violent crime/to commit a violent act (assault or murder)
alleged killer (or attacker)/suspect in a case of violent crime
to be attacked by an assassin
